title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5.29 - Reporting employment opportunities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5.29 - Reporting employment opportunities

State Regulations

Each employer shall each day provide the appropriate
employment information center with general information of employment
opportunities expected to be available the following work day for casual
security officers. Such information shall be maintained in the appropriate
employment information center. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5.29

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
